General.Name: Guangdong Banbao Toy Co Ltd
General.Description: Mubang High-Tech Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells educational plastic block and infant preschool building block toys in China. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shantou, China.
